Articles.Content:
Hi all.

This isn't really about an addon, but I wasn't sure where to ask.

So I'm trying to use one of the parts from the 0.13 version of the game and it works correctly and everything, but there is information in the info panel that I can't seem to get rid of.

I'm trying to get rid of everything the red arrow is pointing at (strength and ejection force). Any ideas where that info is kept at?

P.s. I am only doing this for my personal use.

It looks like you might have both the old and new systems on there at once.

Try changing module = Decoupler to module = Part

Edited April 27, 2013 by EndlessWaves
